books.title: The Absolute at Large
books.author: Karel Čapek
books.summary: An inventor builds an atomic engine which converts matter into energy, but has the unfortunate side-effect of liberating divinity into the world.

books.title: Bulldog Drummond
books.author: H. C. McNeile
books.summary: A demobilized officer places a newspaper advert for adventure, and its response leads him to discover a conspiracy.

books.title: Personal Memoirs of Ulysses S. Grant
books.author: Ulysses S. Grant
books.summary: One of the greatest generals of the United States tells the story of his life and details his key role in winning the Civil War.

books.title: A General History of the Pirates
books.author: Captain Charles Johnson
books.summary: The lives and stories of the daring pirate outlaws who terrorized the Atlantic Ocean and Caribbean Sea in the 18th century.

books.title: The Story of the Amulet
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Four children are reunited with an ancient, magical creature and go on adventures through time with a magic amulet.

books.title: Man and Superman
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: Jack Tanner flees both London and responsibility when he is made guardian of his childhood friend Ann Whitehead.

books.title: Henry IV, Part II
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: The rebel forces plan another assault against King Henry’s forces after losing at the Battle of Shrewsbury.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of Baron Munchausen
books.author: Rudolph Erich Raspe
books.summary: The legendary Baron Munchausen’s tall tales of wonder and adventure.

books.title: Steppenwolf
books.author: Hermann Hesse
books.summary: A man is forced to reconcile different aspects of his personality and find purpose in life.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: The complete U.S. public domain short fiction of horror legend H. P. Lovecraft.

books.title: South!
books.author: Ernest Shackleton
books.summary: A British expedition sets off to cross Antarctica, but when their ship is wrecked they have to face a long struggle for survival.

books.title: The Mystery of 31, New Inn
books.author: R. Austin Freeman
books.summary: A detective investigates a potentially spurious will and a man’s mysterious death.

books.title: Histories
books.author: Herodotus
books.summary: Herodotus recounts the history and geography of the ancient world.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Errico Malatesta
books.summary: A collection of essays by Errico Malatesta.

books.title: A Cycle of the West
books.author: John G. Neihardt
books.summary: A series of epic poems that recounts the history, legends, and mythology of the American West.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of Baron Munchausen
books.author: Rudolph Erich Raspe
books.summary: The legendary Baron Munchausen’s tall tales of wonder and adventure.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Manly Wade Wellman
books.summary: A collection of horror and science fiction stories by Manly Wade Wellman.

books.title: Russian Folktales
books.author: A. N. Afanasyev
books.summary: A collection of Russian folktales compiled by A. N. Afanasyev, translated and edited by Leonard A. Magnus.

books.title: Religion and the Rise of Capitalism
books.author: R. H. Tawney
books.summary: A tracing of the development of religious thought from the Middle Ages to the dawn of the Industrial Revolution.

books.title: The Giant Raft
books.author: Jules Verne
books.summary: An ex-slave trader with an encrypted note schemes about its meaning, while a man with a secret past travels with his family down the Amazon in a giant raft to attend his daughter’s wedding.
